action.action-desc: Mr. Gottheimer (for himself and Mr. Lance) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitation on the deduction for certain taxes, including state and local property and income taxes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cutting Local Taxes by Reinstating SALT Act.

section.header: Repeal of limitation on deduction for state and local, etc. taxes

subsection.text: Section 164(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking paragraph (6) (as added by Public Law 115â€“97) and all that follows.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2017.
